skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: I specialze in creating visually appealing and user-friendly front-end designs using HTML,CSS,JavaScript, and frameworks like React. My focus is on building responsive , intuitive interfaces that seamless user experience while combining principles.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: I specialize in building robust and efficient back-end systems using Node.js, Express, MongoDB, and MySQL. My focus is on creating secure APIs, managing server-side logic, and ensuring smooth data flow to deliver scalable and reliable web solutions.

skills.title: UI & UX Design
skills.description: I design intuitive and visually engaging user interfaces that enhance the overall user experience. By combining creativity with user-centered design principles, I ensure seamless navigation and functionality across all devices.

skills.title: Webflow Development
skills.description: I build responsive, visually stunning Webflow websites, combining modern design with functionality for easy management and optimal performance.

portfolio.title: Apple Website
portfolio.description: This project focuses on designing and developing a visually appealing, responsive, and user-friendly frontend for the Apple website, replicating its sleek, minimalistic design. It utilizes modern web technologies and best practices to ensure optimal performance across devices while aligning with Apple's brand identity.

portfolio.title: Netflix Clone
portfolio.description: This project involves developing a Netflix clone, replicating the platform’s functionality with features like user authentication, movie categories, dynamic content, and video streaming. It demonstrates modern web development practices, focusing on seamless frontend and backend integration.

portfolio.title: Amazone Clone
portfolio.description: This project involves building a fully functional Amazon clone, an e-commerce web application with a dynamic user interface and a robust backend. It replicates key Amazon features like product listings, user authentication, shopping cart, and order processing for a seamless shopping experience.

testimonial.description: Great experience working with Bereket. he delivered a seamless and efficient solution, demonstrating strong technical skills and attention to detail. The project was completed on time, and communication throughout was excellent. Highly recommend for any development needs!

Working with Bereket was a fantastic experience. his attention to detail, professionalism, and commitment to excellence made the entire process smooth and enjoyable. I look forward to future collaborations!

Great work on developing our company website! It’s user-friendly, visually appealing, and truly represents our brand. The project was completed on time, and we’re happy with the results. Thank you for your hard work and dedication!
